message.body: Any Ms to pickup?
Morales and Morse might be decent value picks.
Montero as a backup catcher. Only cause he is a catchee
How's Wilhelmsen shaping up?
Oh yeah was just about to say him.
And Ackley?
I think he will get a ton of saves
No clue on ackley. Could be awesome
But probably wouldn't bet on him as your starter
Took wilhemsen
Justin Smoak is out of control this spring. If he can figure it out that would be a huge bonus
Totally. Will be eyeing him first week for possible pickup
Who is Brandon Maurer?
He is going to make the rotation. Killing it this spring.
Hmm...legit stuff?
Not as talented as some others in our system. But he beat the big 3 to the majors. Very mature on the mound
I am not comparing him to Pineda stuff wise. But he has had a similar rise in our system
And our system is stocked with pitchers
Cool. A couple of my guys will go on DL, and might give him a turn or two
Yeah I really don't know a ton about him. Last year he started really rolling and then this spring he has lit it up.
